dmca.title: [EV1-C1685316D] FW: Copyright Infringement.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Sunday, November 05, 2006 1:29 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1685316D] FW: Copyright Infringement. Subject: [EV1-C1685316D] FW: Copyright Infringement. ==== Original Message ==== (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) ________________________________ From: LadyCibelle [mailto:editing@nb.sympatico.ca] Sent: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 10:54 AM To: Copyright Subject: Copyright Infringement. A user of The Planet is posting stolen stories on six different websites. He or she has copied my stories, "Pop Goes The Weasel Ch. 01" without my permission. The originals are located on Literotica.com: http://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=218874 The stolen versions are here: http://xxlpenis.com/2006/10/20/pop_goes_the_weasel_ch_01/ I hereby assert that my name is Chantal Rioux AKA LadyCibelle, that I am the author and sole legal owner of these stories, and that the 'The Planet' user running the website "xxlpenis.com" has committed an offense against the Section 501 of the United States Copyright Act and "the infringement may also constitute a criminal misdemeanor or felony, which would be prosecuted by the U.S. Department of Justice." I expect immediate attention to this matter. You have 2 business days to respond before I bring this to the attention of my attorney. LadyCibelle editing@nb.sympatico.ca MIME element (text/html)

 

 

From: LadyCibelle [mailto:editing@nb.sympatico.ca]
Sent: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 10:54 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Infringement.

 

A user of The Planet is posting stolen stories on six different websites. He or she has copied my stories, "Pop Goes The Weasel Ch. 01" without my permission.

The originals are located on Literotica.com: ht tp://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=218874


The stolen versions are here: http:/ /xxlpenis.com/2006/10/20/pop_goes_the_weasel_ch_01/



I hereby assert that my name is Chantal Rioux AKA LadyCibelle, that I am the author and sole legal owner of these stories, and that the ‘The Planet’ user running the website "xxlpenis.com" has committed an offense against the Section 501 of the United States Copyright Act and "the infringement may also constitute a criminal misdemeanor or felony, which would be prosecuted by the U.S. Department of Justice."

I expect immediate attention to this matter. You have 2 business days to respond before I bring this to the attention of my attorney.

 

 

LadyCibelle

editing@nb.sympatico.ca
